leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

queries: [WEB] protein-protein interaction prediction deep learning github
[WEB] protein complex structure prediction alphafold github
[WEB] geometric deep learning for protein docking github

tools.name: EvoDOCK
tools.one_line_profile: Memetic algorithm for all-atom protein-protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A Memetic Algorithm that boosts accuracy and speed of all-atom protein-protein docking, designed for evolutionary optimization of complex structures.

tools.name: Jupyter Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter notebooks for molecular docking protocols
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks for performing molecular docking protocols interactively, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: EquiPNAS
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant deep graph neural networks for protein-nucleic acid binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pLM-informed E(3) equivariant deep graph neural network model designed for predicting protein-nucleic acid binding sites.

tools.name: ProRNA3D-single
tools.one_line_profile: Single-sequence protein-RNA complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein-RNA complex structures using biological language models from single sequences.

tools.name: DIPS-Plus
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced database and tools for protein interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: The Enhanced Database of Interacting Protein Structures for Interface Prediction, providing data and potentially tools for training interface prediction models.

tools.name: DProQ
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning prediction of protein complex structure quality
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for assessing the quality of protein complex structures (QA).

tools.name: DeepInteract
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning framework for predicting protein interface contacts
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework utilizing Geometric Transformers for predicting protein interface contacts.

tools.name: DeepRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for refining protein complex structures
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method designed for refining and assessing protein complex structures.

tools.name: MULTICOM3
tools.one_line_profile: System for improving AlphaFold-based protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: Software system for improving AlphaFold2 and AlphaFold-Multimer based protein tertiary and quaternary structure prediction, ranked in CASP15.

tools.name: MULTICOM4
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure prediction system from MULTICOM lab
tools.detailed_description: The MULTICOM4 protein structure prediction system developed by the Bioinformatics and Machine Learning Lab at the University of Missouri.

tools.name: ProteomeLM
tools.one_line_profile: Proteome-scale language model for PPI and gene essentiality
tools.detailed_description: A proteome-scale language model allowing fast prediction of protein-protein interactions and gene essentiality across taxa.

tools.name: SurfDock
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-Informed Diffusion Generative Model for Protein-ligand Docking
tools.detailed_description: SurfDock is a Surface-Informed Diffusion Generative Model for reliable and accurate protein-ligand complex prediction.

tools.name: AlGDock
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular docking with Alchemical Interaction Grids
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular docking utilizing Alchemical Interaction Grids.

tools.name: DeepPPISP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for protein-protein interaction sites prediction
tools.detailed_description: Predicts protein-protein interaction sites by combining local and global features with deep neural networks.

tools.name: VortexDock
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed molecular docking system
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based distributed molecular docking system that supports parallel computation across multiple nodes to improve virtual screening efficiency.

tools.name: PoseX
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: PoseX is a benchmark suite designed for evaluating molecular docking methods.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold2-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deep learning for large-scale PPI screening
tools.detailed_description: Fast deep learning methods for large-scale protein-protein interaction screening, developed by Cong Lab.

tools.name: DeepRank-GNN-esm
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Network for PPI with language model features
tools.detailed_description: Graph Network for protein-protein interface prediction including language model features (ESM).

tools.name: Deeprank-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Network for protein-protein interface
tools.detailed_description: Graph Network based framework for analyzing protein-protein interfaces.

tools.name: DeepRank
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for protein-protein interface data mining
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for data mining of protein-protein interfaces (Legacy version).

tools.name: DeepRank2
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for data mining of protein interfaces and variants
tools.detailed_description: An open-source deep learning framework for data mining of protein-protein interfaces or single-residue variants.

tools.name: iScore
tools.one_line_profile: Ranking protein-protein docking models
tools.detailed_description: MPI supported software for ranking protein-protein docking models based on a random walk graph kernel and support vector machines.

tools.name: AF2Complex
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting direct PPI with AlphaFold models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting direct protein-protein interactions using AlphaFold deep learning neural network models.

tools.name: Peptide Docking with AF2/RoseTTAFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protocols for peptide docking using AF2 and RoseTTAFold
tools.detailed_description: Code and protocols for peptide docking using AlphaFold2 and RoseTTAFold, as described in the associated publication.

tools.name: AlphaRED
tools.one_line_profile: AlphaFold-initiated replica exchange protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A method for AlphaFold-initiated replica exchange protein docking.

tools.name: GeoDock
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Protein-Protein Docking with Multi-Track Iterative Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A method for flexible protein-protein docking using a Multi-Track Iterative Transformer.

tools.name: Anchor
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription Factor Binding Site Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Algorithm for in vivo Transcription Factor Binding Site Prediction, winner of ENCODE-DREAM challenge.

tools.name: EquiBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for small molecule binding structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: Geometric deep learning method for fast predictions of the 3D structure in which a small molecule binds to a protein.

tools.name: DeepVS
tools.one_line_profile: Docking-Based Virtual Screening with Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for boosting docking-based virtual screening campaigns using deep learning.

tools.name: CLAPE-SMB
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning-based predictor for protein-small molecule binding sites
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to predict binding sites between proteins and small molecules, specifically designed to address data scarcity in binding site prediction.

tools.name: PhysDock
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-guided diffusion model for protein-ligand complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that integrates physical constraints into an all-atom diffusion model to accurately predict the 3D structures of protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: PeSTo
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein binding interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based method using geometric deep learning to predict protein-protein and other molecular binding interfaces directly from atomic coordinates without requiring multiple sequence alignments.

tools.name: PeSTo-Carbs
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning predictor for protein-carbohydrate binding interfaces
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the PeSTo architecture specifically trained to predict binding interfaces between proteins and carbohydrates using geometric deep learning on structural data.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular surface interaction fingerprinting for protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework that analyzes molecular surfaces to predict protein-protein interactions, identify binding pockets, and generate surface fingerprints for docking.

tools.name: MaSIF-neosurf
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-based protein design tool for ternary complexes
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of MaSIF designed for the prediction and design of protein surfaces in the context of ternary complexes, enabling surface-centric protein engineering.

tools.name: MAPE-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Microenvironment-aware protein embedding for PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for predicting protein-protein interactions that incorporates microenvironment-aware embeddings to capture detailed structural and physicochemical context.

tools.name: AlphaFastPPi
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated AlphaFold-Multimer pipeline for PPI screening
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined pipeline leveraging AlphaFold-Multimer for high-throughput screening of protein-protein interactions, optimized for speed and efficiency in detecting binders.

tools.name: DockStream
tools.one_line_profile: Unified wrapper interface for molecular docking software
tools.detailed_description: A flexible platform that wraps various molecular docking backends into a unified interface, designed to facilitate the integration of docking into de novo molecular design workflows.

tools.name: MzDOCK
tools.one_line_profile: GUI-based automated pipeline for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly graphical interface pipeline for performing molecular docking tasks, automating the preparation and execution steps for researchers.

tools.name: DeepDock
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for binding conformation prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning approach to predict the binding conformations of bioactive molecules, leveraging graph neural networks to model molecular interactions.

tools.name: gnina-torch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GNINA scoring function
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch reimplementation of the GNINA molecular docking scoring function, enabling differentiable scoring and integration into deep learning pipelines.

tools.name: RFDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Protein hallucination and inpainting using RoseTTAFold
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for de novo protein design, including hallucination and inpainting, leveraging the RoseTTAFold architecture to generate novel protein backbones and sequences.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A highly accurate deep learning tool for predicting protein structures and multi-chain complexes from sequence information, utilizing a three-track network architecture.

tools.name: Protein Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Joint sequence and structure generation with RoseTTAFold diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model for simultaneous generation of protein sequences and structures, expanding the capabilities of RoseTTAFold for protein design tasks.

tools.name: LABODOCK
tools.one_line_profile: Colab-based platform for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-based suite of molecular docking tools running on Google Colab, providing an accessible interface for performing docking simulations without local resource constraints.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Finite Element Method solver for 2D fracture propagation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based solver for simulating arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: iLearnPlus
tools.one_line_profile: Automated machine-learning platform for nucleic acid and protein analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive machine learning platform with a graphical user interface for feature extraction, analysis, and prediction using nucleic acid and protein sequence data.

tools.name: AMDock
tools.one_line_profile: Assisted molecular docking wrapper for AutoDock4 and Vina
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly graphical tool that streamlines the molecular docking process using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina, designed for Linux and macOS environments.

tools.name: AMDock-win
tools.one_line_profile: Windows version of AMDock for assisted molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: The Windows-compatible version of the AMDock tool, providing a GUI for assisted molecular docking with AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: TopoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Topological transformer for protein-ligand complex interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing topological data analysis and transformer architecture to predict protein-ligand complex interactions.

tools.name: VinaLC
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel molecular docking program based on AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance parallel computing version of AutoDock Vina developed by LLNL, designed for large-scale virtual screening on HPC clusters.

tools.name: Physics-aware-Multiplex-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-aware Multiplex Graph Neural Networks for molecular systems
tools.detailed_description: A universal geometric deep learning framework for molecular systems that incorporates physical constraints and multiplex graph representations.

tools.name: CLAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning and pre-trained encoder for binding sites prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to predict protein-ligand binding sites.

tools.name: RLMM
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environment for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning environment designed for molecular modeling tasks, specifically focusing on protein-ligand docking.

tools.name: DockCoV2
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular docking pipeline against SARS-CoV2
tools.detailed_description: A specialized molecular docking pipeline developed by Taiwan AI Labs for screening drug databases against SARS-CoV2 targets.

tools.name: MEGADOCK
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-high-performance protein-protein docking software
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance protein-protein docking tool designed for heterogeneous supercomputers, utilizing FFT-based algorithms.

tools.name: QuickBind
tools.one_line_profile: Light-weight and interpretable molecular docking model
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning model for molecular docking that emphasizes lightweight architecture and interpretability.

tools.name: MCGLPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric representation learning for protein-protein complex property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating molecular coarse-grained models into geometric representation learning for predicting properties of protein-protein complexes.

tools.name: dockit
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput molecular docking wrapper for Vina engines
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to facilitate high-throughput molecular docking with multiple targets and ligands using AutoDock Vina series engines.

tools.name: aws-rosettafold
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure template for running RoseTTAFold on AWS Batch
tools.detailed_description: A deployment toolkit and Jupyter notebooks for running the RoseTTAFold protein structure prediction model on AWS cloud infrastructure.

tools.name: Struct2Graph
tools.one_line_profile: GCN with mutual attention for PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks with mutual attention mechanisms for predicting protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: metascreener
tools.one_line_profile: Integration script for docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts that integrates various docking, virtual screening, similarity search, and molecular modeling programs into a unified workflow.

tools.name: GraphSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site prediction using graph transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting protein-DNA binding sites using graph transformers and predicted protein structures.

tools.name: LMetalSite
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free metal ion-binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting metal ion-binding sites from protein sequences using pretrained language models and multi-task learning.

tools.name: scalar-fields
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Scalar Fields for Molecular Docking
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Equivariant Scalar Fields for molecular docking using Fast Fourier Transforms, enabling efficient and accurate docking simulations.

tools.name: CarsiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning paradigm for accurate protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based docking tool that leverages large-scale pre-training for accurate protein-ligand docking and screening.

tools.name: MaSIF_colab
tools.one_line_profile: dMaSIF implementation for Google Colab
tools.detailed_description: A Google Colab wrapper/implementation for dMaSIF (differentiable Molecular Surface Interaction Fingerprinting), facilitating the prediction of protein interaction sites.

tools.name: AutoDock-Vina
tools.one_line_profile: Standard open-source molecular docking software
tools.detailed_description: One of the most widely used open-source programs for molecular docking, designed for efficient prediction of protein-ligand binding modes.

tools.name: flashfold
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for protein and protein complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the prediction of protein structures and protein complexes, likely leveraging AlphaFold or similar methodologies.

tools.name: CReM-dock
tools.one_line_profile: Docking-guided chemical molecule generation tool
tools.detailed_description: CReM-dock integrates molecular docking with the CReM library to generate chemically reasonable molecules that fit into a specific protein binding pocket.

tools.name: EquiDocker
tools.one_line_profile: Dockerized deployment for EquiDock rigid protein docking
tools.detailed_description: Provides a containerized environment to run the EquiDock system for rigid body protein-protein docking, simplifying dependency management.

tools.name: HADDOCKer
tools.one_line_profile: Docker images for the HADDOCK biomolecular docking system
tools.detailed_description: Containerized version of HADDOCK (High Ambiguity Driven protein-protein DOCKing) to facilitate the prediction of biomolecular complex structures.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold_Docker
tools.one_line_profile: Docker image for RoseTTAFold structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: A containerized deployment solution for the RoseTTAFold system from the UW Baker Lab, enabling easier setup for protein structure and complex prediction.

tools.name: curcuma
tools.one_line_profile: Small molecular docking and conformation filtering tool
tools.detailed_description: A simple tool designed for small molecule docking and filtering of molecular conformations.

tools.name: DeepDock
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: An experimental package from DeepChem utilizing deep learning techniques for molecular docking tasks.

tools.name: parallel-PLANTS
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel execution wrapper for PLANTS docking software
tools.detailed_description: Scripts to enable parallel molecular docking using the PLANTS (Protein-Ligand ANT System) software.

tools.name: rgl
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization system for R
tools.detailed_description: A 3D visualization system based on OpenGL that provides a medium to high-level interface for use in R, widely used for scientific data visualization including molecular structures.

tools.name: dockstring
tools.one_line_profile: Package for molecular docking with curated benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates molecular docking and provides an extensive, highly-curated dataset and realistic benchmark tasks for drug discovery.

tools.name: Uni-Dock
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated molecular docking program
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, GPU-accelerated molecular docking program developed by DP Technology.

tools.name: Uni-Dock2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation GPU-accelerated molecular docking software
tools.detailed_description: The second version of Uni-Dock, offering enhanced GPU acceleration for molecular docking tasks.

tools.name: Uni-Fold
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source platform for protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A reimplementation and improvement of AlphaFold for protein structure prediction, supporting training and inference.

tools.name: MolModa
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based molecular docking environment
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool that allows users to perform molecular docking entirely within their web browsers.

tools.name: PEPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for predicting protein-protein interactions, implemented in Fortran.

tools.name: AFM-LIS
tools.one_line_profile: Local Interaction Score calculation from AlphaFold-Multimer
tools.detailed_description: Tools to calculate Local Interaction Scores (LIS) from AlphaFold-Multimer predictions to enhance protein-protein interaction discovery.

tools.name: GUIFold
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for running local AlphaFold2 jobs
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for managing and submitting AlphaFold2 jobs on local installations or queuing systems.

tools.name: pipgcn
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Interface Prediction using Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) for predicting protein-protein interaction interfaces.

tools.name: alphafold-peptide-receptors
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for identifying peptide-receptor interactions
tools.detailed_description: A notebook-based workflow for identifying and modeling peptide-receptor interactions using AlphaFold-Multimer.

tools.name: DiffDock
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion generative model for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: State-of-the-art deep learning model for molecular docking that treats docking as a generative modeling problem using diffusion processes.

tools.name: gnina
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A molecular docking software that utilizes convolutional neural networks for scoring and pose prediction, built upon Smina/AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: AlphaFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of AlphaFold 2, an AI system that predicts a protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence with high accuracy.

tools.name: haddock-restraints
tools.one_line_profile: Restraint generation tool for HADDOCK
tools.detailed_description: A utility to generate distance restraints for HADDOCK docking simulations from various data sources.

tools.name: haddock-runner
tools.one_line_profile: Runner for large-scale HADDOCK simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to facilitate running large-scale HADDOCK docking simulations with multiple input molecules and scenarios.

tools.name: haddock-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility scripts for HADDOCK
tools.detailed_description: A collection of useful scripts for preparing input files and analyzing output data for the HADDOCK docking software.

tools.name: HADDOCK3
tools.one_line_profile: Modular integrative modeling software
tools.detailed_description: The next generation of HADDOCK, redesigned as a modular pipeline for integrative modeling of biomolecular complexes.

tools.name: PRODIGY
tools.one_line_profile: Binding affinity prediction for protein-protein complexes from structural data
tools.detailed_description: PRODIGY (PROtein binDIng enerGY prediction) is a structure-based predictor of binding affinity in protein-protein complexes. It predicts binding free energy using structural features like intermolecular contacts and non-interacting surface properties.

tools.name: CoPRA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-RNA binding affinity prediction using cross-domain pretrained models
tools.detailed_description: CoPRA (Complex-Protein-RNA Affinity) bridges cross-domain pretrained sequence models with complex structures to predict protein-RNA binding affinity. It integrates sequence and structural information to estimate interaction strength.

tools.name: DTMOL
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion transformer model for target-based molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: DTMOL is a diffusion transformer-based model designed for target-based molecular docking. It leverages generative diffusion processes to predict the binding pose of ligands within protein targets.

tools.name: DMFF-DTA
tools.one_line_profile: Dual modality feature fused neural network for drug-target affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: DMFF-DTA is a deep learning model that integrates binding site information with dual modality feature fusion to predict drug-target binding affinities, aiding in drug discovery processes.

tools.name: YuelPocket
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding site prediction using graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: YuelPocket utilizes graph neural networks to predict protein-ligand binding sites. It processes protein structures as graphs to identify potential pockets where ligands might bind.

tools.name: vina_docking
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripts for automating Vina docking against DUDE targets
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts designed to facilitate and automate molecular docking workflows using AutoDock Vina, specifically targeted at the DUD-E dataset protein targets.

tools.name: PIDA
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of protein-protein interaction docking solutions
tools.detailed_description: PIDA (Protein Interaction Docking Analysis) is a tool for analyzing multiple PPI docking solutions. It calculates contact regions using mdtraj and provides visualizations via nglview to assess docking quality.

tools.name: DeepComplex
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning prediction of inter-chain contacts in protein complexes
tools.detailed_description: DeepComplex is a deep learning method for predicting inter-chain contacts within protein complexes. It aids in reconstructing protein quaternary structures by identifying interface residues.

tools.name: MPBind
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: MPBind utilizes transformer architectures to predict protein binding sites from sequence and structural information, focusing on identifying functional residues involved in interactions.

tools.name: PUResNetV2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: PUResNetV2.0 is a deep learning approach for predicting ligand binding sites on protein surfaces, utilizing residual networks to identify potential pockets.

tools.name: AlphaCutter
tools.one_line_profile: Removal of non-globular regions from predicted protein structures
tools.detailed_description: AlphaCutter is a utility script designed to process predicted protein structures (e.g., from AlphaFold) by removing non-globular or disordered regions, improving the quality of structures for downstream docking or analysis.

tools.name: Rapppid
tools.one_line_profile: Regularised automatic prediction of protein-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: Rapppid (Regularised Automatic Prediction of Protein-Protein Interactions using Deep Learning) is a computational tool for predicting PPIs using deep neural networks with regularization techniques.

tools.name: PPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein Language Model for contact and interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: PPLM is a Protein-Protein Language Model that employs novel attention mechanisms to enhance the prediction of inter-protein contacts and interactions, leveraging sequence data.

tools.name: AutoParty
tools.one_line_profile: ML-guided visual inspection tool for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: AutoParty is a machine learning-guided tool designed to assist in the visual inspection of molecular docking results, helping to prioritize and analyze docking poses.

tools.name: DiffDock-PP
tools.one_line_profile: Rigid protein-protein docking with diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: DiffDock-PP is a generative diffusion model for rigid protein-protein docking. It predicts the docked conformation of protein complexes by learning the diffusion process over the group of rigid body transformations.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug-target interaction and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepPurpose is a comprehensive deep learning library for drug discovery tasks, including Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, drug property prediction, PPI, and protein function prediction.

tools.name: DOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning based docking decoy evaluation method
tools.detailed_description: DOVE (DOcking decoy eValuation mEthod) is a deep learning-based scoring function for evaluating protein-protein docking models. It distinguishes near-native structures from incorrect decoys using interface features.

tools.name: EPBD-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription factor binding site prediction using BERT
tools.detailed_description: EPBD-BERT applies BERT-based language models to predict transcription factor binding sites on DNA sequences, aiding in the identification of mutations and drug discovery targets.

tools.name: LightDock
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein/peptide/DNA docking framework based on GSO algorithm
tools.detailed_description: LightDock is a macromolecular docking framework that uses the Glowworm Swarm Optimization (GSO) algorithm. It supports protein-protein, protein-peptide, and protein-DNA docking with flexibility and scoring.

tools.name: LightDock (Python 2.7)
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy Python 2.7 version of the LightDock docking framework
tools.detailed_description: This is the legacy Python 2.7 implementation of the LightDock framework for macromolecular docking. Users are generally encouraged to use the Python 3 version.

tools.name: AlphaFold-StepByStep
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts to run AlphaFold2 and Multimer step-by-step
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and instructions to run AlphaFold2 and AlphaFold-Multimer in a step-by-step manner, allowing for greater control over the structure prediction pipeline.

tools.name: Dockey
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Dockey is an integrated platform designed to streamline molecular docking and virtual screening workflows, providing an interface for managing ligands, targets, and docking runs.

tools.name: DELPHI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning prediction of protein-protein binding sites
tools.detailed_description: DELPHI is a deep learning-based method for predicting protein-protein binding sites from sequence and structural information, aiming to identify interface residues accurately.

tools.name: DeepLocalProteinDocking
tools.one_line_profile: Learning protein representation for rigid-body docking
tools.detailed_description: DeepLocalProteinDocking focuses on learning local protein representations to facilitate rigid-body protein docking, improving the sampling and scoring of docked conformations.

tools.name: AutoDock-Notebooks
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based molecular docking notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter notebooks designed to run AutoDock-based molecular docking workflows in cloud environments (e.g., Google Colab), making docking accessible without local installation.

tools.name: mBER
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Binder Engineering and Refinement for antibody design
tools.detailed_description: mBER (Manifold Binder Engineering and Refinement) enables antibody binder design by leveraging structure templates and sequence conditioning in backprop design through AlphaFold-Multimer.

tools.name: MeetDock
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein Docking software
tools.detailed_description: MeetDock is a software tool for protein-protein docking, designed to predict the complex structure formed by two interacting proteins.

tools.name: DockCADD-v2
tools.one_line_profile: Automated computational framework for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: DockCADD-v2 is an automated computational framework designed to facilitate molecular docking workflows in Computer-Aided Drug Design (CADD).

tools.name: eFindSite
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand binding site prediction and virtual screening tool
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based approach for ligand binding site prediction and virtual screening, utilizing meta-threading to identify potential binding pockets.

tools.name: Plantain
tools.one_line_profile: Fast molecular docking with AI pose scoring
tools.detailed_description: A molecular docking tool that integrates an AI-based pose scoring function to achieve fast and accurate ligand placement.

tools.name: PIPR (seq_ppi)
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based protein-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Multifaceted Protein-Protein Interaction Prediction Based on Siamese Residual RCNN', using sequence data to predict interactions.

tools.name: ModTox
tools.one_line_profile: MD trajectory analysis platform for toxicity prediction
tools.detailed_description: An in silico platform to analyze Molecular Dynamics trajectories using metrics, clustering, and machine learning techniques, specifically for toxicology.

tools.name: EquiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for rigid protein-protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A rigid 3D protein-protein docking method using SE(3)-equivariant graph neural networks for fast structure prediction.

tools.name: SpatialPPIv2
tools.one_line_profile: GNN and PLM based PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: Enhances protein-protein interaction prediction by combining graph neural networks with protein language models.

tools.name: DockingPie
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to facilitate consensus docking analysis, integrating results from multiple docking programs.

tools.name: AFProfile
tools.one_line_profile: AlphaFold-multimer MSA profile denoiser
tools.detailed_description: Improves protein complex prediction with AlphaFold-multimer by denoising the Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) profile.

tools.name: SpeedPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid PPI network creation from MSAs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for rapid creation of protein-protein interaction networks directly from multiple sequence alignments.

tools.name: PandaDock
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based molecular docking tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based molecular docking implementation utilizing physics-based scoring.

tools.name: STRING2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Function prediction from PPI network topology
tools.detailed_description: Predicts protein function (GO terms) based on the topology of protein-protein interaction networks using deep maxout neural networks.

tools.name: PyPLIF-HIPPOS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular interaction fingerprinting tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecular interaction fingerprints from docking results of Autodock Vina and PLANTS, aiding in post-docking analysis.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand binding site prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based tool for predicting ligand binding sites from protein structures, known for its speed and accuracy.

tools.name: Pocket-CFDM
tools.one_line_profile: Artificial binding pocket generation for diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A tool to augment training datasets for generative diffusion models in molecular docking by creating artificial binding pockets.

tools.name: BIPSPI
tools.one_line_profile: Partner-specific protein binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: Predicts binding sites on a protein surface specifically for a given interaction partner.

tools.name: gdock
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm-based protein-protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A protein-protein docking tool implemented in Rust using genetic algorithms for optimization.

tools.name: CryptoSite
tools.one_line_profile: Cryptic binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library for identifying cryptic binding sites in proteins, which are sites that only become accessible upon ligand binding.

tools.name: D-SCRIPT
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware sequence-based PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable deep learning model that predicts protein-protein interactions from sequences while implicitly modeling structural contacts.

tools.name: Metal Binding Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-based metal binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: Methods to predict metal ion binding sites in proteins using amino acid sequence data.

tools.name: PPIprediction
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Zernike descriptor based PPI interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: Software utilizing 3D Zernike descriptors and SVMs for predicting protein-protein interfaces.

tools.name: Bichrom
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription factor binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable bimodal neural network for predicting transcription factor binding sites from DNA sequence and chromatin accessibility data.

tools.name: ATTRACT
tools.one_line_profile: Macromolecular docking program suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite for docking protein-protein, protein-nucleic acid, and protein-peptide complexes.

tools.name: GGNN_Meets_PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric DL with Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Integration of pre-trained protein language models into geometric deep learning networks for protein tasks.

tools.name: DeepSurf
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-based ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach that uses protein surface representations to predict ligand binding sites.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning model for predicting protein–DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: Geometric deep learning of protein–DNA binding specificity. It predicts the binding specificity of proteins to DNA sequences using geometric deep learning techniques.

tools.name: GrASP
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Attention Site Prediction for identifying druggable binding sites
tools.detailed_description: Graph Attention Site Prediction (GrASP): Identifying Druggable Binding Sites Using Graph Neural Networks with Attention. It leverages graph neural networks to predict potential binding sites on protein surfaces.

tools.name: HDXRank
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to rank protein-protein complex predictions using HDX-MS restraints
tools.detailed_description: Applies HDX-MS (Hydrogen-Deuterium Exchange Mass Spectrometry) restraints to rank protein-protein complex predictions, aiding in the structural determination of complexes.

tools.name: PhosIDN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for protein phosphorylation site prediction
tools.detailed_description: PhosIDN: an integrated deep neural network for improving protein phosphorylation site prediction by combining sequence and protein–protein interaction information.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold2NA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein/nucleic acid complex structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: RoseTTAFold2 protein/nucleic acid complex prediction. It extends RoseTTAFold to predict structures of complexes involving proteins and nucleic acids (DNA/RNA).

tools.name: SDOCK2.0
tools.one_line_profile: FFT-based global protein-protein docking program
tools.detailed_description: Fast Fourier transform (FFT) based global protein-protein docking program incorporates stepwise force field potentials in the scoring function for accurate complex modeling.

tools.name: ProQDock
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein docking scoring program using SVR
tools.detailed_description: ProQDock is a Protein-Protein docking scoring program that uses high level coordinate driven features compiled and trained by a Support Vector Regression algorithm.

tools.name: SPOC
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for scoring binary AlphaFold-Multimer predictions
tools.detailed_description: Code repository for the SPOC tool for scoring binary AF-M (AlphaFold-Multimer) predictions, aiding in the identification of high-confidence interactions.

tools.name: libzdock
tools.one_line_profile: Library for ZDOCK predictions and PDB structure handling
tools.detailed_description: ZDOCK predictions and PDB structures library in C++ and Python. Provides programmatic access to ZDOCK docking functionalities.

tools.name: EBMDock
tools.one_line_profile: Neural probabilistic protein-protein docking via energy-based models
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation for the paper 'EBMDOCK: Neural Probabilistic Protein-Protein Docking via a Differentiable Energy-Based Model' (ICLR 2024).

tools.name: GRASP-JAX
tools.one_line_profile: Protein complex structure prediction using experimental restraints (JAX)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate protein complex structure prediction using diverse experimental restraints. This is the JAX implementation of the GRASP method.

tools.name: MARPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale residual network for PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: MARPPI: Boosting prediction of protein−protein interactions with multi-scale architecture residual network.

tools.name: iDeep
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated prediction of RNA-protein binding sites
tools.detailed_description: iDeep: integrated prediction of RNA-protein binding sites using deep learning. It combines multiple data sources to predict RBP binding sites.

tools.name: ElliDock
tools.one_line_profile: Rigid protein-protein docking via equivariant elliptic-paraboloid interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Rigid protein-protein docking via equivariant elliptic-paraboloid interface prediction' (ICLR 2024). A geometric deep learning approach to docking.

tools.name: FragXsiteDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Drug Target Interaction Prediction using binding sites and fragments
tools.detailed_description: Drug Target Interaction Prediction Using Protein Binding Sites And Drug Fragments. A deep learning model for DTI prediction.

tools.name: DeepCSeqSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding sites prediction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Protein-ligand binding sites prediction toolkits using deep learning methods based on sequence information.

tools.name: PepPCBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Protein-Peptide Complex Structure Prediction with AlphaFold3
tools.detailed_description: Comprehensive Benchmark for Protein-Peptide Complex Structure Prediction with AlphaFold3. Provides datasets and evaluation protocols for peptide-protein docking.

tools.name: GeoBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for nucleic acid binding interface segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Segmentation of nucleic acid binding interface on protein surface with geometric deep learning. Identifies RNA/DNA binding sites on protein structures.

tools.name: NeuralPLexer
tools.one_line_profile: State-specific protein-ligand complex structure prediction model
tools.detailed_description: NeuralPLexer: State-specific protein-ligand complex structure prediction with a multi-scale deep generative model. Capable of predicting conformational changes upon ligand binding.
